# AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus.off

**Case**

Lens stabilization isn’t specified for this photo capture.

## Declaration

```swift
case off
```

## Lens stabilization values

- **AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus.unsupported**: Lens stabilization isn’t available on the device or device configuration that captured this photo.
- **AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus.active**: Lens stabilization was active for the full duration of the photo capture.
- **AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus.outOfRange**: Lens stabilization was enabled for the photo capture, but device motion or capture duration exceeded the stabilization module’s correction limits.
- **AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus.unavailable**: Lens stabilization was temporarily unavailable during the photo capture.
